data.message: Dear Facebook, please try to investigate a page call "Deal Man', there is so many people out there in the world including me are also the victim of "Deal Man", and after i gather all the information from most of the victim, we figure out they might already hack some setting so we couldn't possibly go to their page and report to Facebook, Please help us. Thank you so much.

replies.message: Hi Kevin. You can report a Page to us by following the steps listed in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2vCazO6. Thanks! -Caitlin
